author: Paul Ramella
comment: Loving this app so far. Date picker disable feature is a welcome addition.

reply.author: Kodeglam Mobile
reply.content: Thank you. Please look forward to the next update. ^^;

author: Michael Benjamin
comment: This should have been a native wear app built into wear, but oh well, I appreciate the developers effort.

author: Shawn Altorio
comment: A very nice calendar app that has the right Material-design feel for wear. However, it does need more left margin when viewing daily event listings and event details, as part of the text gets cut off on the Moto 360's round display. Also, it would have been nice to at least have a sample event to see what the event and event details screens look like before buying.
title: Good but needs some formatting, better demo

author: Leo Monaco
comment: Very easy to use on my Moto 360. Let's you scan your schedule very easily and quite a few features. I paid for the premium version because really that's the only way to get to see each entry,  but I am so glad I did.  Only thing is the left margin slightly cuts off the text due to the circular screen.
title: Very intuitive interface, best calendar app so far

author: Sandra Arreola
comment: It works great on my Moto 360.  Totally worth it. I like being able to briefly pull up my agenda for a given day. Can you make it so if you swipe right from the watch face, the calendar appears? Kind of like mini launcher allows you to swipe from the left...
title: Calendar on your smartwatch

author: Mark C
comment: Purchased the premium, and found that the detail view shows two days instead of just the correct one. For example when I open Jan 3rd. I get details for the 3rd and 4th.  I guess I'm just out $1.99. At least now I know not to purchase anything else from this developer.
title: Not Functioning Correctly

author: don frank
comment: The app is good, there are a few bugs. The all day events show up the day before too. I would like to see different colors on the day selection it blends in too much with the header . I would also like to see all of the notes in the calendar entry. This app is a good start. I have the LG g3 phone. I also have the LG G smart watch.
title: A great start

author: Naveen B
comment: this application is good to try something new look on ur smart watch.. but the reminder and birthdays.. if they show a different colors.. instead of main calender color.. then it would be more atractive... as i said... if u dont want to pick ur phone from pocket and like to operate everything on watch.. this is good one..
title: i would like to recomend premium but

author: Michael W
comment: I would love to purchase this, but I don't know if it's that much better over other calendars since I can't fully use it unless I buy it. If I upgrade and don't like it, it won't be a good because it's in app purchase, making it difficult to refund. The best I can give this is 3 stars based off the free versions capabilities. Considering that all you can see is the calendar with no other function, and that there are free versions that offer even a little function, its a pretty generous rating.
title: Seems ok, BUT who knows?

author: Lillian Utsumi
comment: I purchased the full version and when it works, it's great.  But, since I bought my Moto 360 six weeks ago I've had to uninstall and reinstall this app at least three-four times.  When it stops working I get a white screen.
title: Works for a while then stops

author: Mike McCann
comment: Two things I hope to see addressed soon: 1. Please fix all day events to only show on the correct days. 2. Please bump the text over a bit to the right on event details/agenda views on round displays(Moto 360) so it doesnt get chopped off on the left side.  Do these two things and 5 stars for sure!  UPDATE: Looks like the developer has abandoned this app.
title: Love it but a couple issues

author: Lennon Leikam
comment: ... they really should admit it is a PAY app and not free. The free version is so basic it's pointless to have but the pay version is very functional and works how you'd expect. 4 star rating because it's an awesome app but they should admit it's a pay app to begin with and not try to trick people.
title: Best looking Calendar app for Wear but...

author: Ben Udkow
comment: Bought the full version and it's totally worth it.  Great little app.  Super clear and easy to read.  Only issue is that All Day events still show up the day before.
title: Awesome!  (But all day bug still exists for me)

comment: This is a well put together smartwatch app, probably the best calendar I've used on any watch. I would only really use it to forward plan dates at a glance but, I paid for the additional extras so they're there for when it would be inconvenient to pull out my phone.
title: Does the job

author: R Ski
comment: No update in over a year. No tech support. Appointments show up on wrong days. I really wanted this to work. What good is a calendar that shows your events on the WRONG DAYS?! That problem is NOT FIXED like they claim. Save your money.
title: Don't waste your time

author: Lloyd Songne
comment: It doesn't show any of my calendar events from my Outlook email account that are present on my phone. Selecting a day all I see is "Free version". Don't feel like paying money for an untested app. Look elsewhere....
title: This app is worthless

author: Justin Cuomo
comment: Some events (possibly "all day" ones) show in the correct day but also the day before as a separate event. I believe the app itself is causing the issue bc nothing else seems wrong in the google calendar itself.
title: Works well but issue...

author: Jonathan Chen
comment: I like the ability to now switch between days. However can you add it to both corners so lefties like me can use the buttons without our finger blocking the screen. Also, instead of tapping corners, being able to swipe up/down to change days (similar to month view)  would be nice too!
title: New prev/next button

author: T.J. S.
comment: Please indent the agenda on the paid version. Right now it's cut off on the left side of the screen because of the round edge. It's still legible but it looks terrible. Also, the events are not showing on the correct day for some reason. It would be perfect if those issues were taken care of.
title: Round UI needs work

author: Joe Kovacs
comment: Very nice start, too bad the dev has abandoned it. Also, due to the limitations of the free version you can't thoroughly test before buying. Still looking for a good calendar app for Wear. I can't believe there are so few choices out there.
title: Looks like it's been abandoned

author: Chloe Adams
comment: I downloaded it. It comes up on a page asking what colour I want and what day I want the week to start on. I can pick those things, but then there are only 2 buttons underneath, "more" which took me to a list of apps in Google Play and upgrade.... Why has everyone given it such good ratings, I don't know :/
title: What the?

author: Gordon Kerr
comment: Works well but keeps watch screen on forever if you forget to swipe it away causing huge battery drain. Would also benefit from a dark theme. Hate white backgrounds!
title: Pretty good

author: Jesse Staab
comment: When looking at the appointment list, the time is cut off just a tad due to round screen, please increase the left margin just a tad. Also, when in the app, the screen won't go off?! Fix these bugs and I'll gladly change to five stars as there is great potential here.
title: A few bugs - moto 360

author: Ken Lowe
comment: I love it. I'm fairly new to Android Wear - I've only had my watch a week but this application profoundly increases the usefulness of the device. I opted for the premium version and now have my calendar on my watch. How great is that? For a couple of bucks this is a great value.  This app is helping me become a big fan of Android Wear.

author: Trevor Roberts
comment: I paid for the premium features to be able to see my calendar events on my watch. A month later, I had to factory reset my phone, and I lost all paid features. Can you give me my money back or re-upgrade me?
title: No more paid features

author: Andrew Sinzinger
comment: Good calendar app but I have 1 big complaint. Why would you make the next days all day evens show up on the day before? It gets very confusing and I'm not a fan but everything else is good. Fix that and it'll be 5 stars.
title: Good app

author: Alan Ryder
comment: I recently bought this app and I'm impressed. It's very useful and I don't have to pull out my phone when I want to check an appointment. That being said, please change the name of the app in the app drawer to something other than the stock calendar app. Make it Wear Calendar or something unique and my score will be higher.
title: Good app, bad chice for the app name in the app drawer

author: 佐藤秀一
comment: Why don't you just change the name? Stop calling it by silly literal name like "Calendar for Android Wear." There are four apps with undistinguishable name like "Wear Calendar," "Calendar for Android" or alike. Please make it "CalWatch" or "WristCal" or something unique and impressive. Otherwise, users cannot write even a simple review article.

author: Colin Henry
comment: The premium version allows for agenda viewing which I really like, however on the moto 360 the event name is not fully visible unless it is dead center at the widest point of the screen.  A simple fix would be to tab over the events for the moto just a few places to keep them in view longer.  A really cool fix would be to have the event follow the contour of the screen as you scroll! A full 5 star rating when fixed,  thank you! Also,  having more colors to choose from and/or different colors for each month.
title: Very good, perfect with one mod....

author: Albe- Tani
comment: The freely downloadable app is a bluff and a waste of users' time. If they wanted to go for the pay - to - use option they should have not have issued a freeware with NO functionalities (barely the general design is appreciable).
title: Bluff

author: Jacob Heck
comment: I like it, and it works, but had to give 4 stars because on the moto360, it is partially cut off. Had the gear live and it was fine, moved to the moto360 and part of the event card is cut off. Fix that and I'll update my review to 5 stars!

author: Dominic Allkins
comment: Looks great and can see how it works - but need the ability to select which calendar to view in settings.  I run several Google Calendars for different roles bit can't work out how to change the calendar. Annoying.

author: Bob Smith
comment: At first I thought this was a great app. I was wrong. Activating the paid features requires an in app purchase. But, after removing and REINSTALLING the app on my tablet the PAID FEATURES ARE NO LONGER AVAILABLE. What? This is simply wrong, in my opinion very wrong. The extra features should be available to unlock as a separate paid app so I can reinstall this app without paying again. Summary: THIS IS A TERRIBLE APP, JUST LIKE STEALING YOUR MONEY FOR EXTRA FEATURES. DO NOT BUY PREMIUM FEATURES.
title: In app purchase cannot be reinstalled twice - terrible policy

author: Jacob Orr
comment: Since the new is came for the watch, I can't see/find/use this app. Please fix or help! This was amazing before!
title: Not working with LG G Watch

author: Jay Porta
comment: So I'll skip the coffee tomorrow. No biggie. It's a nice app. I wish Google had this already. It runs very jittery though, but that's probably the Moto 360's CPU.
title: Worth the money

author: Harold Slavin
comment: decided to give the paid version a try, it doesn't function properly it is showing the wrong days of events and some are double entries. I'm out $1.85 not the worst thing.
title: paid version not functioning properly

author: J Heaton
comment: A good calendar app for Android Wear.  However, it leaves the screen on when not in use for Moto 360 (Gen 1) devices.  Hence, this is a considerable battery drain !

author: Andrew Jackson
comment: The icon and name of the app on the phone are very confusing, being similar to the Google calendar.  Perhaps change the icon to have a watch with a calendar?
title: Good on wear confusing on phone

author: Joe Boos
comment: Paid app is well worth it. I don't have to pull out my phone to look at my Google calender. Only thing is it would be nice to have some custom color options for the calender.
title: Very good

author: Cory Loxtercamp
comment: This is wonderfully simple. The only problem is the all day event bug is still present for me. If this gets fixed, and I really hope it does, it will be perfect.
title: Great calendar app
